abstract:
. We attempt to deﬁne what is necessary to construct an Arti-
ﬁcial Scientist, explore and evaluate several approaches to artiﬁcial gen-
eral intelligence (AGI) which may facilitate this, conclude that a uniﬁed
or hybrid approach is necessary and explore two theories that satisfy this
requirement to some degree.
Keywords: AGI · AI for Science · Science Robotics.
